Package kesako.watcher.runnable

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IndexFileErrorProcess
    Process that push files in index error to be re-indexed.
    IndexFileProcess
    Process that index files within a batch of nbFiles.
    IntervalDBWork
    Abstract class that construct a new interval thread that will run on the given interval with the given name.
    IntervalWork
    Abstract class that construct a new interval thread that will run on the given interval with the given name.
    ListSourceProcess
    Monitor the list of sources and create a watcher by source to survey the content of the source and update the index.
    MetaFileProcess
    Update the file meta-data by reading the meta-data file < filename >.meta
    The class implements the Log4J logging system.
    SourceWatcher
    Check the content of a source and update the index
    The class implements the Log4J logging system.
